text:
Plain Concepts | Barcelona, Spain | ONSITE | VISA

We are looking for a software crafts(wo)man to join our small, family-like, Barcelona team.

We develop tailored software solutions for our customers. We are specialized on, although not limited to, Microsoft .Net ecosystem. We work with latest technologies and many of our projects are PoCs and demos for companies like Microsoft.

Take a look at the offer: https://plainconcepts.workable.com/jobs/335899 and our web https://www.plainconcepts.com/

Also, I can answer any question you may have :)
